step1.title: Data Collection
step1.description: We continuously monitor and collect data from major AI platforms, tracking model releases, updates, and usage metrics.

fragmented.title: Fragmented Discovery
fragmented.description: Models are scattered across multiple platforms, making it hard to find the right one.
fragmented.solutionDescription: Centralized platform with comprehensive model listings and advanced search capabilities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about Model Guru

questions.q1: How does Model Guru collect model data?
questions.a1: We collect data through publicly available APIs and information provided by platforms. We update our data regularly to ensure accuracy and timeliness. For more details, check our methodology page.
questions.q2: Does Model Guru provide API access?
questions.a2: Currently, we don't offer API access, but it's on our roadmap. Premium subscribers will be the first to get access when it launches. If you're particularly interested in this feature, please contact us.
questions.q3: How often is the data updated?
questions.a3: We update our data daily to ensure you have access to the most current information about AI models across all platforms.
questions.q4: Can I suggest a platform to be added?
questions.a4: Absolutely! We're always looking to expand our coverage. Please contact us with your suggestions.
questions.q5: What are the Premium features and how do I get them?
questions.a5: Premium features include advanced analytics (detailed metrics, trends), custom report generation, API access, and priority support. You can upgrade to Premium via the "Upgrade" button or links found on comparison/report previews.
questions.q6: How does the model comparison tool work?
questions.a6: You can select models from the "All Models" page or the comparison tool section on the homepage. Add models using the 'Add to Comparison' button. Compare selected models side-by-side based on metrics like performance, cost (if available), and features. Premium users can compare more models and access deeper insights.
questions.q7: What kind of reports does Model Guru offer?
questions.a7: We offer Daily Insights, Weekly Analysis, and Monthly Strategy Reports. Daily reports track short-term trends, weekly reports analyze medium-term growth and opportunities, and monthly reports provide comprehensive market analysis for long-term planning. Access to full reports is a Premium feature.
questions.q8: How do I switch between dark and light mode?
questions.a8: Use the theme switcher button (usually a moon or sun icon) located in the top-right corner of the page to toggle between dark and light themes. Your preference is saved locally.
questions.q9: Where can I find documentation or tutorials?
questions.a9: Check our Blog section for tutorials, guides, and AI model insights. API documentation and detailed user guides will be available soon.

faq.q1: How does Model Guru collect model data?
faq.a1: We collect data through publicly available APIs and information provided by platforms. We update our data regularly to ensure accuracy and timeliness. For more details, check our methodology page.
faq.q2: Does Model Guru provide API access?
faq.a2: Currently, we don't offer API access, but it's on our roadmap. Premium users get access to detailed reports which offer significant insights. If you're particularly interested in API access, please contact us.
faq.q3: How often is the data updated?
faq.a3: We update our data daily to ensure you have access to the most current information about AI models across all platforms.
faq.q4: Can I suggest a platform to be added?
faq.a4: Absolutely! We're always looking to expand our coverage. Please contact us with your suggestions.
faq.a5: Model Guru is a centralized platform for discovering, tracking, and analyzing AI/ML models across various providers like Hugging Face, Replicate, and more. We aim to simplify model discovery and provide insights for developers and businesses.
faq.q6: How is Model Guru different from platforms like Hugging Face or Replicate?
faq.a6: While platforms like Hugging Face host models and Replicate provides APIs to run them, Model Guru focuses on *discovery and analytics across* these platforms. We provide unified tracking, comparison tools, and trend reports that span the entire ecosystem.
faq.q7: How do I use the platform?
faq.a7: You can browse models, filter by platform or category, view detailed model pages with metrics, compare models, and explore our reports (premium feature). Sign up for an account to save favorites and receive personalized updates.
faq.q8: What are the benefits of a premium account?
faq.a8: Premium users get access to comprehensive daily, weekly, and monthly reports detailing model trends, usage patterns, and potential monetization opportunities. This includes unfiltered data and deeper analytics not available to free users.
faq.a9: We take data security seriously. User account information is protected using industry-standard practices. We do not store sensitive personal data beyond what's necessary for account management. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.
faq.q10: How can I contribute or provide feedback?
faq.a10: We welcome feedback and suggestions! Please use the contact link in the footer to share your thoughts or report any issues.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: A team of AI and machine learning experts dedicated to simplifying AI model discovery

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Model Guru's mission is to simplify the adoption of AI technology by providing a unified, transparent platform for AI model discovery. We believe that by removing barriers to discovering and evaluating AI models, we can accelerate innovation and enable more people to harness the power of AI.

career.title: Join Our Team
career.subtitle: Help build the future of AI model discovery and analytics

aboutRole.title: About the Role
aboutRole.description: We're looking for a skilled Next.js Full Stack Developer to join our growing team. You'll be responsible for developing and maintaining our web platform, working on both frontend and backend components, and helping to shape the future of AI model discovery and analytics.

responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Develop and maintain our Next.js-based web application
Build and optimize frontend components using React and TypeScript
Work with our data layer (IndexedDB, SQLite) and sync mechanisms
Collaborate with the team to design and implement new features
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and contribute to technical discussions

requirements.title: Requirements
items: 3+ years of experience with Next.js and React
Experience with modern frontend technologies (TailwindCSS, SWR, etc.)
Knowledge of backend development and API design

niceToHave.title: Nice to Have
items: Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)

weOffer.title: What We Offer
items: Opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies

howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.description: To apply for this position, please send your resume and a brief cover letter to support@modelguru.deepseek.diy. Include links to your GitHub profile and any relevant projects or contributions.
